item.title: Retraced Path
item.description: For complete perks, see d2gunsmith.com, light.gg or destinytracker.com. The Retraced Path is the first Legendary Trace Rifle in Destiny, added during the 30th Anniversary Event in December, 2021. As CoolGuy mentions in his video review (linked below), the available perks and resulting perk combos offer substantial flexibility. Some of the final column perks are so strong you don’t necessarily need to combo them with anything. That being said, we’ll only highlight combo rolls since you don’t need a wishlist to tell you “Keep ones with Tricorn” ðŸ˜‰
